level.heading: Security interests arising under Article 2 or 2A.
level.text: A security interest arising under § 28:2-401, 2-505, 2-711(3), or 2A-508(5) is subject to this article. However, until the debtor obtains possession of the goods:
The security interest is enforceable, even if § 28:9-203(b)(3) has not been satisfied;
Filing is not required to perfect the security interest;
The rights of the secured party after default by the debtor are governed by Article 2 or 2A; and
The security interest has priority over a conflicting security interest created by the debtor.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 28:9-109, § 28:9-203, and § 28:9-322.
